id.description: Unique identifier for the chat message

sender_id.description: Identifier of the user who sent the message

receiver_id.description: Identifier of the user or group who received the message

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was sent

status.description: Status of the message (e.g., sent, delivered, read)

type.description: Type of message (e.g., text, image, video)

conversation_id.description: Identifier of the conversation thread or chat session
